name: COMP_ASMT_REVIEW
description: The COMP_ASMT_REVIEW table contains information about which users marked the hospice comprehensive assessment as reviewed and when.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CA_REVIEW_USER_ID
columns.description: Holds the user record ID of the user who marked the comprehensive assessment as reviewed.

columns.name: CA_REVIEW_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CA_REVIEW_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the UTC instant at which the comprehensive assessment was marked as reviewed.
